Class LeaderboardAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class LeaderboardAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<LeaderboardAdapter.LeaderboardViewHolder>
    Adapter class for populating leaderboard recycler view with player data
